name: Marcus Comes Out Online (littlerat)
description:
A year after graduating from university, Marcus has just come out as a trans man to his family and one of his old roommates, Erin. 

Finding that he needs some space to figure things out, he decides to spend a week downtown to work on his transition. The next step? Coming out to his old friends online.

---

Marcus Comes Out Online is a visual novel. Join Marcus for a day as he figures out his transition for the first time: coming out on social media, figuring out paperwork, and exploring the city.

One ending, about 20 minutes for a playthrough.

The game is free, but if you pay $3 or more you can support me as a creator and get a digital art collection containing the art from the game, sketches, and author's notes.

---

This game is part of a two-game series. Play the standalone sequel:
Peyton's Post-Op Visits

---

Content Notice: This game involves issues that trans men and trans-masculine people might face, which is a topic that can be sensitive and personal.

---

Story, Coding, Art: littlerat

Music and SFX: Pocket Sound

Caption Tool for Ren'Py: npckc

Special thanks to npckc and Krissi!
